All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Board
Board class This class represents a board in the Trello-Lite application.
BoardController
This class is the controller of the Board class.
BoardView
This class is a JPanel that displays a board.
ButtonStyle
This class is used to create a button with a custom style.
Card
Card class This class represents a card in the Trello-Lite application.
CardCreatorView
This class is the controller of the card creator view.
CardList
CardList class This class represents a list of cards in the Trello-Lite application.
CardListController
This class is the controller of the Board class.
CardListView
This class is a JPanel that displays a list of cards.
CardPreView
This class is a JPanel that displays a preview of a card.
CheckBoxPanelStyle
This class is a PANEL with a list of check boxes.
ComboBoxStyle
This class is a JComboBox with a custom style.
ConfirmationDialog
This class represents the confirmation dialog controller of the application.
FullCardController
 
FullCardView
This class is the view of a CARD.
LabelStyle
This class represents the style of the labels.
LoginController
LoginController class This class is the controller of the login view.
LoginView
LoginView class This class represents the login view of the Trello-Lite application.
ManagerController
This class is the controller of the ManagerView class.
ManagerView
This class is a JPanel that displays the workspace manager.
MyStyle
This interface contains all the style constants used in the application.
OpenCardController
This class is the controller of the CARD preview.
OptionPaneStyle
This class represents the OptionPane style of the application.
PanelStyle
This class represents the style of the panels.
Participant
Participant class This class represents a participant in the Trello-Lite application.
ParticipantCreatorView
This class represents the style for a constructor window.
Role
Role enum This enum represents the role of a participant in the Trello-Lite application.
ScrollPaneStyle
This class is a JScrollPane with a custom style.
TabbedPaneStyle
This class is used to style the JTabbedPane.
TextType
This enum contains the different types of text.
TrelloMain
This class is the main class of the program.
Workspace
Board class This class represents a board in the Trello-Lite application.
WorkspaceInfoView
This class is a JPanel that displays information about the currently selected workspace.
WorkspaceManager
WorkspaceManager class This class represents the workspace manager of the Trello-Lite application.
WorkspaceView
This class is used to display the boards of a workspace.
